mapper.select: SELECT * FROM admin WHERE AD_ID = #{AD_ID} AND AD_PW = #{AD_PW} AND AD_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM user WHERE
US_NAME LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') US_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') US_NICK LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') 1 = 1
ORDER BY US_IDX asc

SELECT * FROM product WHERE
US_NAME LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') PD_SUBJECT LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') PD_CATEGORY LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') 1 = 1
ORDER BY PD_UPDATED_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM admin WHERE RL_NAME != '최고관리자' ORDER BY AD_IDX asc

SELECT ap.APD_IDX , ap.APD_OWNER , ap.APD_NAME , ap.APD_DETAIL , c1.value as APD_CATEGORY , c2.value as APD_REJECTION , ap.APD_REG_DATE , ap.APD_STATUS FROM auction_product ap LEFT JOIN common c1 ON ap.APD_CATEGORY = c1.code LEFT JOIN common c2 ON ap.APD_REJECTION = c2.code WHERE
c.value = #{type} 1 = 1
ORDER BY ap.APD_REG_DATE desc

SELECT RP_IDX , TO_US_ID , FROM_US_ID , c1.value AS RP_STATUS , c2.value AS RP_CATEGORY , RP_TIME FROM report rp LEFT JOIN common c1 ON rp.RP_STATUS = c1.code LEFT JOIN common c2 ON rp.RP_CATEGORY = c2.code

SELECT CM_IDX , CM_ID , CM_TITLE , CM_NICK , CM_CATEGORY FROM community WHERE
CM_ID LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') CM_NICK LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') CM_TITLE LIKE concat('%', #{keyword} , '%') 1 = 1
ORDER BY CM_REG_DATE desc
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'APD_STATUS' AND hide = 'N' ORDER BY code asc
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'APD_REJECTION' AND hide = 'N' ORDER BY code asc
SELECT * FROM common WHERE name = 'ROLE_TYPE' AND code != 'ARL01' AND hide = 'Y' ORDER BY code asc
